name: places/ChIJr-qsFzNZwokRapiwMVdbZes
adrFormatAddress: 830 3rd Ave, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text:
Uninformed, useless, rude staff
I went in to ask about the 4.30% CDs.
When I asked roughly how much I would make in a year on $50,000 she told me roughly $230. This woman works in a BANK! How can anyone’s math be that bad who works in a bank?

I asked how sustainable Republic Bank is. She did not know what sustainable meant, and said the bank was solvent. I wanted to know where  the bank invested their clients’ money (gas, oil? for instance?) She had no idea. Nor did the other woman working there either. They told me that they do not have that information. Don’t you think they SHOULD have that information? Not only did they not know, they had zero interest. At this point they both ignored me .Wouldn’t you want to know the kind of bank/institution you worked for? Republic Bank has zero motivation in attracting new clients.

How the managers of Republic Bank can expect people to invest money in a bank blindly, and with their untrained staff knowing absolutely nothing, and not caring and having no interest whatsoever is extraordinary to me.

Way to go to attract customers, Republic Bank! will take my $50,000 elsewhere.

And these were not young Gen Z, by the way, but middle-aged plus ladies who should know better how to treat a potential customer. After I asked them why they were not informed better, they did not look me in the eye, and pretended I wasn’t even there. I was friendly, but obviously, my curiosity and astonishment at the lack of information about Republic Bank’s policies irked them.

What has America come to? People used to want your business .People used to be helpful. The customer was treated with respect. Not at Republic Bank, obviously.

Remember, this is the CLIENTS’ money. The money is not the bank’s but the client’s. Why are they treating people with such disrespect? Republic bank needs to be more transparent and train their staff properly.

originalText.text: I don't know the circumstances of some people's reviews but I've had nothing but GREAT experiences with the staff at 3rd Ave and 51st St.

text.text: I don't know the circumstances of some people's reviews but I've had nothing but GREAT experiences with the staff at 3rd Ave and 51st St.

originalText.text: Don’t recommend, unhelpful staff. Many many other options just next door.
